tldr: This article reviews the biology of insect parasitoids and cleptoparasitoids, focusing on non-hymenopteran species. It discusses their evolutionary context, pathways to and from the parasitoid lifeway, and provides an overview of the different types of parasitoids. The article also highlights the importance of studying non-hymenopteran parasitoids, as they are often overlooked in comparison to the more commonly studied parasitic Hymenoptera.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Ecology and Evolution
